text: These warriors are highly experienced and proficient fighters led by Sergeant Gunther Schepke, Bernhardt's second in command. As part of the respected mercenary army known as the Grudgebringers they are completely loyal to their Commander.
This machine fires heavy cannonballs which can tear through enemy regiments and light buildings with ease.

Taking their name from their Commander's powerful sword 'Grudgebringer' these mercenaries form the core of the army known as the Grudgebringers. They are skilled in combat and ride into battle on mighty warhorses.
As part of the respected Grudgebringer mercenary army, these troops are skilled in their art and loyal to their Commander.

Helmgart Keep is the home of Franz Erikson who leads a regiment of bowmen. These 'Helmgart Bowmen', while not the best of their kind, had served with honour and even took part in saving the Emperor's cousin, Countess Isabell, from a bandit ambush.
Johann Keeler's longbows have gained a reputation throughout Averland as skilled archers, competing in many provincial tournaments. They also hold field experience from previous mercenary campaigns.
On the orders of King Ungrunn Dragonbane, envoy Engrol Goldtongue with a small army of well-known regiments was sent to help the allied Empire.

Determined and confident, Dwarfs are immensely strong and resilient although slow on their feet. They will flee in only the most desperate circumstances and their hatred for Orcs and Goblins makes them even less likely to rout when fighting them.

These massive creatures stand twice as tall as a man and are far more strongly built. Although they are not particularly intelligent, they are strong and tough and fight ferociously. Ogres provoke fear.
These tall, agile warriors are armed with powerful longbows. They are quick on their feet, are not slowed by difficult terrain and are equally as good hand-to-hand fighters as other Elves.
These extremely large creatures are incredibly strong and tough. However, their dry woody skin suffers great damage if burned, so fire is their greatest enemy. Treemen provoke fear.

Ramon Black formed the Avengers after a Skaven raiding party burned their homes and killed their families during an attack on their town of Wissenheim. They are sworn to hunt down and kill Skaven wherever they can find them.

These warriors form part of the militia commanded by the Border Prince and former mercenary Sven Carlsson, a personal friend of Bernhardt. They ride into battle on mighty warhorses and are proficient in combat.
These warriors form part of the militia commanded by the Border Prince and former mercenary Sven Carlsson, a personal friend of Bernhardt. They are proficient in combat.

Charged with the protection of Emperor Karl Franz' cousin Countess Isabel. Led by Captain Heinz Klemper, these halberdiers, like all the Empire's heavy infantrymen, are highly trained and proficient melee fighters.

Siegfried Vannheim is a well renowned mercenary captain and has worked all through the Old World and beyond during his years leading the '75th. Reputably a staunch disciplinarian, Vannheim is followed by his cavalry troops with faithful loyalty and a respect for his veteran experience in the trade
These extremely large creatures are incredibly strong and tough. However, their dry woody skin suffers great damage if burned, so fire is their greatest enemy. Treemen provoke fear.

A lone Elven Ranger of the Black Mountains, Ceridan is a descendant of the ancient elves who created the Menhir and like the past generations of his family, his eternal quest is to protect the Standing Stones.

These warriors originate from the cold and inhospitable lands of Norsca where they fight under the command of Eric Ragnar, their leader and a personal friend of Bernhardt. They ride into battle on mighty warhorses and are skilled in combat.

This machine fires heavy cannonballs which can tear through enemy regiments and light buildings with ease, but is progressively more inaccurate the further it fires. Its enormously long range is only equalled by Orc Rock Lobbers.
Determined and confident, Dwarfs are immensely strong and resilient although slow on their feet
Flagellants' madness gives them superhuman strength and resilience and they fight with outstanding fury
Halberdiers, like all the Empire's infantry, are highly trained and proficient fighters
Having sipped from the grail itself, these Knights are the most powerful of all the Knights of Bretonnia
Helmgart bowmen are armed with standard bows which have a medium range
These highly trained warriors were once swordsmen of the Empire, but abandoned it to fight outside the law for greater material gain
These Knights belong to the most numerous of the Bretonnian orders of chivalry
These tall, agile warriors are armed with powerful longbows. Their skill as archers is excellent and their bows have a very long range
These tall, agile warriors live in the forests of Loren. They are quick on their feet, are not slowed by difficult terrain and are skilled in combat
These troops are armed with powerful crossbows, which have a long range but require line of sight to their target
These warriors are highly experienced and proficient fighters led by Sergeant Gunther Schepke, Bernhardt's second in command
These warriors form part of the militia commanded by the Border Prince and former mercenary Sven Carlsson
These warriors originate from the cold and inhospitable lands of Norsca where they fight under the command of Eric Ragnar
These warriors wield so large swords, that they must be swung with both hands and therefore strike with great force
These young mercenaries are fairly inexperienced, but make an exceptional rapid response force
This machine fires explosive shells high into the air, sending them crashing into enemy ranks
This machine fires heavy cannonballs which can tear through enemy regiments and light buildings with ease, but is progressively more inaccurate the further it fires
Ice Magic is a native form of Magic practised in the northern regions of Kislev. An Ice Mage is able to control magical energy to produce deadly spells of ice and cold

Amber wizards, are solitary individuals, preferring the company of wild beasts to that of fellow men. Amber is the magic of wild places and bestial minds of dark forests and untamed places. Consequently Allor despises the supernatural properties of warpstone and uses his powers to destroy it wherever he finds it.
A lone Elven Ranger of the Black Mountains

This wagon carries the treasury of the Grudgebringers, and few things in the world are more valuable to mercenaries than a chest of gold. The treasure is guarded by a detachment of crossbow snipers and Klaus.
While Ludwig's steam tank is being repaired, he get in Nuln mechanical steed which was created by the greatest engineer Chaos Robie
While Ludwig's steam tank is being repaired, his loyal dwarfs have built a steam weapon that can be comfortably used on horseback.
The repair of the tank will soon be completed, but some more time is needed. To great luck, the dwarves from Ludwig's team managed to get a working gyrobomber and fasten a volley gun to it
The steam tank Ignis Draconis was the first tank built by Leonardo of Miragliano.
Ludwig von Uberdorf's steam tank was seriously damaged in the last victorious battle, while the dwarves of his crew are repairing it, he will have to rely on himself for some time
This machine fires heavy cannonballs which can tear through enemy regiments and light buildings with ease, but is progressively more inaccurate the further it fires.

These tall, agile warriors range out of the forests of Athel Loren. They are quick on their feet, are not slowed by difficult terrain and are far more skilled with the spear than their Human counterparts.
Skeleton Archers are armed with standard bows.
Blomkwist's Mortars fires explosive shells high into the air, sending them crashing into enemy ranks.
Personal advisor to Tzarina Katarin, Stormbringer is a wielder of Kislev's Ice Magic. He is able to produce deadly spells of frost and cold.
Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar.
Founder and commander of the mercenary company called the Grudgebringers, named after Morgan's magic sword Grudgebringer.

The fame of the Carroburg Greatswords dates back to the Age of Three Emperors. In 1865 IC, they successfully defended the city of Carroburg, then under the control of Reikland, from the count of Middenland. Throughout the course of the battle, their white uniforms were stained red with blood. Since then, they have worn crimson uniforms.
Under the influence of their leader, Jurgen Muntz, these highly trained warriors have abandoned the Empire to fight outside the law for greater material gain.

The Ostland Elector Count's eighth son has left his birth state to pursue a military career. He is currently the captain of the 4th Nuln Halberdiers, a mercenary regiment based out of the city of it's namesake.
Young and inexperienced, yet they make an exceptional rapid response force. Under the guidance of their disillusioned leader, they have abandoned the Empire to fight outside the law.
These Knights belong to the most numerous of the Bretonnian orders of chivalry. They ride into battle on powerful Bretonnian warhorses and are highly skilled in combat.
Having sipped from the grail itself, these Knights are the most powerful of all the Knights of Bretonnia. Their skill in combat is extraordinary and they fight determinedly.

Flagellants are men who have been driven over the edge of sanity by some personal disaster or catastrophe, causing them to travel the Empire preaching their nightmare visions of doom. Their madness gives them superhuman strength and resilience and they fight with outstanding fury. Flagellants wear only tattered robes and will not wear armour.
Dwarf Envoy's bodyguard of fierce dwarf warriors are completely loyal and will protect him in battle to the last

Commander Morgan Bernhardt leads the famed mercenary army the Grudgebringers. Named so after the magical sword, wielded by Bernhardt himself. This mighty blade was forged by the Dwarfs and inscribed with magic runes by a Bright Wizard. The sword was gifted to a young Bernhardt in a supposed chance meeting at a alehouse, the Kippered Herring. An ageing Darius Redhand III, one of the Arch Wizards of the Bright College in Altdorf saw potential in this upstart and knowing his sword's unquenchable thirst for battle bequeathed it to Morgan.\\n\\nThey began campaigning in Reikland, earning a reputation as a hard nosed bunch of professional soldiers, who achieved whatever task they were set with grim determination.\\n\\nThe Grudgebringers would go on to prove themselves without question, battling against the insidious Skaven of Grey Seer Thanquol and, in the years that followed, the Undead hordes of the Dread King.\\n

Their regimental patron is Marius Leitdorf, the "Mad" Elector Count of Averland. Like many of Averland's regiments, the 9th Crossbows regularly guard the entrance to Black Fire Pass, route through the Black Mountains.
These multi-barrelled cannons are part of the Emperor's personal army.
The Reiksguard Order comprises an elite core of well-trained and well-equipped troops loyal to the Emperor who fight on his behalf.
Witch Hunter General's War Wagon
Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar.
